Name: Attract Fragments 5
About the game: This game is the first title developed by only one person Maisolo Studio. Attract Fragments 5 is a 3D action RPG to explore can proceed with easy operation with mouse & keyboard Kill enemies, or explore maps to gain weapons, healing items, magic.When the level goes up, the status goes up randomly.You can also assign points yourself Means of attack are usually attack and magic There is no defense, only avoidance Cure is possible with the item Attack: left click Avoidance: C or Ctrl Magic: F Magic, item switch: Q or E Menu: TAB
